name: Glyph Dungeon (Not a Working Title)
description:
In Glyph Dungeon, your character, who you can name, will be forever trapped inside a randomly generated, text-based dungeon. As you progress, you will find newer, better items and become even more powerful than ever, but every run ends in death.

Fear not Death! Death is not the end, but a new beginning. If you are strong enough when you die, then your new incarnation will be even stronger than last time.

Collect Glyphs and Tainted Souls to progress even further into the game and unlock permanent character upgrades.
